artist: Artist: Aki Kuroda  (黒田 明比古, Kuroda Akihiko); Author: Pascal Bonafoux; Publisher: Adrien Maeght Éditeur
description: unbound book in paper wraps, housed in black cloth-covered clamshell box; text resembles letters cut out of magazines and words in various type font styles; abstracted images with human figures, animals and plants; loose volume
image_copyright: © Aki Kuroda%2C Pascal Bonofoux %2F Adrien Maeght %C3%89diteur%2C publisher
markings:
Watermark: Fabriano
Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 67/250
medium: Lithographs in color and black and white, with letterpress, in black cloth-covered clamshell box
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Aki Kuroda │ P. Bonafoux
title: Lettre Anonyme (Anonymous Letter)
